item.title: [mic] Crowded Crypt
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {B}.

Whenever a creature you control dies, put a corpse counter on Crowded Crypt.

{4}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Crowded Crypt: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed for each corpse counter on Crowded Crypt. (A creature with decayed can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

item.title: [mic] Cleaver Skaab
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Horror

{3}, {T}, Sacrifice another Zombie: Create two tokens that are copies of the sacrificed creature.

item.title: [mic] Gorex, the Tombshell
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Zombie Turtle

As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may exile a number of creature cards from your graveyard. This spell costs {2} less to cast for each card exiled this way.

Deathtouch

Whenever Gorex, the Tombshell attacks or dies, choose a card at random exiled with Gorex and put that card into its owner's hand.

item.title: [mic] Eloise, Nephalia Sleuth
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Rogue

Whenever another creature you control dies, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

Whenever you sacrifice a token, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)

item.title: [mic] Zombie Apocalypse
item.description:
Sorcery

Return all Zombie creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped, then destroy all Humans.

item.title: [mid] Component Collector
item.description:
Creature — Homunculus

If it's neither day nor night, it becomes day as Component Collector enters the battlefield.

Whenever day becomes night or night becomes day, you may tap or untap target nonland permanent.

item.title: [mid] Devious Cover-Up
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. You may shuffle up to four target cards from your graveyard into your library.

item.title: [mid] Drownyard Amalgam
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Horror

When Drownyard Amalgam enters the battlefield, target player mills three cards. (They put the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.)

{2}{U}: Drownyard Amalgam can't be blocked this turn.

item.title: [mid] Falcon Abomination
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Bird

Flying

When Falcon Abomination enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

item.title: [mid] Flip the Switch
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

item.title: [mid] Geistwave
item.description:
Instant

Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If you controlled that permanent, draw a card.

item.title: [mid] Otherworldly Gaze
item.description:
Instant

Look at the top three cards of your library. Put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest back on top of your library in any order.

Flashback {1}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [mid] Revenge of the Drowned
item.description:
Instant

Target creature's owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library. You create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

item.title: [mid] Shipwreck Sifters
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

When Shipwreck Sifters enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

Whenever you discard a Spirit card or a card with disturb, put a +1/+1 counter on Shipwreck Sifters.

item.title: [mid] Unblinking Observer
item.description:
Creature — Homunculus

{T}: Add {U}. Spend this mana only to pay a disturb cost or cast an instant or sorcery spell.

item.title: [mid] Bat Whisperer
item.description:
Creature — Vampire

When Bat Whisperer enters the battlefield, if an opponent lost life this turn, create a 1/1 black Bat creature token with flying.

item.title: [mid] Blood Pact
item.description:
Instant

Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.

item.title: [mid] Crawl from the Cellar
item.description:
Sorcery

Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target Zombie you control.

Flashback {3}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [mid] Duress
item.description:
Sorcery

Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

item.title: [mid] Morkrut Behemoth
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Giant

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {1}{B}.

Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

item.title: [mid] No Way Out
item.description:
Sorcery

Target opponent discards two cards. You create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

item.title: [mid] Novice Occultist
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

When Novice Occultist dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

item.title: [mid] Olivia's Midnight Ambush
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. If it's night, that creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn instead.

item.title: [mid] Rotten Reunion
item.description:
Instant

Exile up to one target card from a graveyard. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

Flashback {1}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [mid] Vampire Interloper
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Scout

Flying

Vampire Interloper can't block.

item.title: [mid] Abandon the Post
item.description:
Sorcery

Up to two target creatures can't block this turn.

Flashback {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [mid] Ardent Elementalist
item.description:
Creature — Human Shaman

When Ardent Elementalist enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [mid] Burn the Accursed
item.description:
Instant

Burn the Accused deals 5 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

item.title: [mid] Electric Revelation
item.description:
Instant

As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.

Draw two cards.

Flashback {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost and any additional costs. Then exile it.)

item.title: [mid] Moonrager's Slash
item.description:
Instant

This spell costs {2} less to cast if it's night.

Moonrager's Slash deals 3 damage to any target.

item.title: [mid] Mounted Dreadknight
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Knight

Trample

Mounted Dreadknight enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if an opponent lost life this turn.

item.title: [mid] Neonate's Rush
item.description:
Instant

This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a Vampire.

Neonate's Rush deals 1 damage to target creature and 1 damage to its controller. Draw a card.

item.title: [mid] Pack's Betrayal
item.description:
Sorcery

Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. If you control a Wolf or Werewolf, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

item.title: [mid] Raze the Effigy
item.description:
Instant

Choose one—

• Destroy target artifact.

• Target attacking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

item.title: [mid] Stolen Vitality
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn. If it's your turn, that creature gains trample until end of turn. Otherwise, it gains first strike until end of turn.

item.title: [mid] Voldaren Stinger
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Warrior

Voldaren Stinger has first strike as long as it's attacking.

{2}{R}: Voldaren Stinger gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

item.title: [mid] Ambitious Farmhand // Seasoned Cathar
item.description: Creature — Human Peasant // Creature — Human Knight

item.title: [mid] Lunarch Veteran // Luminous Phantom
item.description: Creature — Human Cleric // Creature — Spirit Cleric

item.title: [mid] Mourning Patrol // Morning Apparition
item.description: Creature — Human Soldier // Creature — Spirit Soldier

item.title: [mid] Galedrifter // Waildrifter
item.description: Creature — Hippogriff // Creature — Hippogriff Spirit

item.title: [mid] Bounding Wolf
item.description:
Creature — Wolf

Flash

Reach

item.title: [mid] Ecstatic Awakener // Awoken Demon
item.description: Creature — Human Wizard // Creature — Demon

item.title: [mid] Bramble Armor
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

When Bramble Armor enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control.

Equipped creature gets +2/+1.

Equip {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [mid] Shady Traveler // Stalking Predator
item.description: Creature — Human Werewolf // Creature — Werewolf

item.title: [mid] Harvesttide Sentry
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

Coven — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more creatures with different powers, Harvesttide Sentry can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn.

item.title: [mid] Return to Nature
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Destroy target artifact.

• Destroy target enchantment.

• Exile target card from a graveyard.

item.title: [mid] Harvesttide Infiltrator // Harvesttide Assailant
item.description: Creature — Human Werewolf // Creature — Werewolf

item.title: [mid] Shadowbeast Sighting
item.description:
Sorcery

Create a 4/4 green Beast creature token.

Flashback {6}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [mid] Tapping at the Window
item.description:
Sorcery

Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

Flashback {2}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [mid] Timberland Guide
item.description:
Creature — Human Scout

When Timberland Guide enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
